Html:
I've got JSHint running. The problem is, I don't know how to set the options for JSHint, or even to see what options are on by default.

I tried the inline syntax (see below) but Chirpy seems to ignore that. Does anyone know how to set the options?

/*jshint evil: true, boss: true */

I asked this question on Stack Overflow but no one even looked at it. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6713563/how-do-i-set-jshint-options-using-chirpy

Config screen for JsHint is now add.

http://chirpy.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/changes/fd920b4a693a
